question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. "pay here" sign
B. street clock
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The "pay here" sign is on a pole in the foreground, while the street clock is on a pole further back, and the background buildings are even further away, making the street clock clearly closer to the camera than the "pay here" sign.
